a 2005 ford taurus experience

*hey, before you read, i encourage you to interact with the work here first! (or don't, it's okay)*

2023. This small, intimate, work came from an exercise in web based interaction. Scripted primarily in jquery, a 2005 ford taurus experience allows a window of digital space to capture a minute moment of action, in a momentary narrative form. In its simplicity, it speaks towards an ability to craft web experiences that don't have to amount to much, but exist for the sake of existence.
